attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Houses are so expensive now that we all make improvements to our homes. The Government are now going to make us pay for this.  If we dont let the council in to view your house (so they can charge you more) they will fine you £1000 and £200 A DAY until you let them in.. This is open to all the unsavoury characters that we have living here that can pretend to be council officials with bogus documents and rob you.  ( The Government!!!)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
